Others: Kawhi Leonard made his season debut for the Los Angeles Clippers against the Atlanta Hawks on January 4, 2025.
Leonard scored 12 points in 19 minutes, going 4 of 11 from the floor, including three 3-pointers.
The Clippers won the game 131-105, breaking open the game in the second quarter and leading by as much as 27 points.
The Clippers are now 20-15 and in seventh place in the Western Conference, with only 2 1/2 games separating the second- to seventh-place teams.
